Steps to plot kNN accuracy

31 May 2018

The following are the steps to plot kNN accuracy vs n_neighbors:

  • Get data and clean it
  • Describe the data
  • Determine accuracy
  • Determine n_neighbors
  • Build the plot
  • Comment on the optimal n_neighbors
